name: Sensō-ji Temple
description: Tokyo’s oldest Buddhist temple, famous for its Thunder Gate and Nakamise shopping street.

name: Tokyo Skytree
description: The tallest tower in Japan with observation decks offering panoramic views.

name: Tsukiji Outer Market
description: Street food stalls and seafood shops around the historic fish market area.

name: Shibuya Crossing
description: World-famous scramble crossing surrounded by neon billboards and shopping.

name: Meiji Shrine
description: Shinto shrine dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken, located in a forest oasis.

name: Fushimi Inari Taisha
description: Iconic Shinto shrine with thousands of vermilion torii gates leading up the mountain.

name: Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion)
description: Zen temple covered in gold leaf surrounded by beautiful gardens.

name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
description: Famous bamboo forest walk, especially atmospheric in the early morning.

name: Gion District
description: Traditional entertainment district famous for geisha culture and tea houses.

name: Nijō Castle
description: UNESCO castle with ornate interiors and beautiful gardens.
